Class GameState

java.lang.Object
com.gr15.pacman.model.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
Represents the current state of the game, including the game configuration, board, entities (Pacman and ghosts), score, lives, and power mode status. This class manages game updates, entity movements, collisions, and game progress.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState(GameConfig config)
      Constructs a new GameState with the specified game configuration. Initializes the board, player (Pacman), ghosts, score, lives, and item count based on the provided configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - the game configuration to initialize the state (must not be null)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if config is null

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(double deltaSeconds)
      Updates the game state based on the elapsed time. Moves Pacman and ghosts, handles power mode duration, detects collisions, updates score, and processes pellet consumption.
      Parameters:
      deltaSeconds - the time elapsed since the last update (in seconds)

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Reset game to initial start state.

    • isWon

      public boolean isWon()
      Checks if the player has won the game. Winning occurs if the game is over and there are still lives left.
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, false otherwise

    • gameOver

      public boolean gameOver()
      Checks if the game is over. The game is over if all items are collected or if no lives remain.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • getBoard

      public GameState.TileType[][] getBoard()
      Returns the current game board.
      Returns:
      the current board

    • getPacman

      public Pacman getPacman()
      Returns the current Pacman entity.
      Returns:
      the Pacman Pacman

    • getGhosts

      public List<Ghost> getGhosts()
      Returns the list of ghost entities.
      Returns:
      list of all ghosts

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the current score.
      Returns:
      the current score

    • getLives

      public int getLives()
      Returns the number of remaining lives.
      Returns:
      the current remaining lives

    • getPowerModeDuration

      public double getPowerModeDuration()
      Returns the remaining duration of the power mode.
      Returns:
      the power mode duration in seconds
